##Thin Mint Frappuccino

Bringing together 3 things that white girls helped hype: Girl Scout cookies, Starbucks, and self-esteem issues. 

This recipe was designed to highlight the wonder that is LB White Chocolate Peppermint. Scott was kind enough to get it into this month's Awesome Box for everyone to try, followed by Liquid Barn restocking this "seasonal" release. 

**No, you can't make any substitutions and arrive at the same result.**
